entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is watching Hagrid's cabin from the window.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper and teacher at Hogwarts. Harry is watching his cabin from the window.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, a student at Hogwarts. She is trying to dissuade Harry from doing something.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: The new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts. Harry is planning to force entry into her office.

entities.name: snuffles
entities.description: Hermione's pet cat, which she expects Harry to be talking to.

entities.name: professor binns
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is teaching History of Magic. Hermione and Harry are inattentive during his class.

relationships.description: Harry is watching Hagrid's cabin from the window, and smoke is coming out of the chimney.
Hermione is trying to dissuade Harry from doing something, and they are in class together with Professor Binns.
Harry is planning to force entry into Umbridge's office at five o'clock.
